nodes.text: Yri Worms Wreak Havoc for Miners

Yri Worms Wreak Havoc for Miners is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force adventure Tilnes Rising. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on October 25 2001. It described the yri worms and Hiem Bryl's offer of a bounty to kill the worms.
